Package com.i2group.apollo.indexadminservice

The i2 Analyze index admin service provides clients with the ability to take a snapshot of the search index that can be backed up without being affected by simultaneous changes being made to the index.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IIndexAdminService
    A pair of methods for taking and releasing a snapshot of the search index in order to enable index backups.

Package com.i2group.apollo.indexadminservice Description

The i2 Analyze index admin service provides clients with the ability to take a snapshot of the search index that can be backed up without being affected by simultaneous changes being made to the index.

The index admin service has one method for taking a snapshot of the search index and another for releasing the snapshot after a backup has been made.

Web methodDescription
TakeSnapshot Takes a snapshot of the search index so that a backup of the index can be performed.
ReleaseSnapshot Releases a snapshot of the search index when it is no longer required.
Since:
3.0
